Detailed Description

The reply of an CoordinateOnItemRequestPacket.

After the normal header this packet contains (subType = COORDINATEONITEM_REPLY):
PosSizeComment
20 4 bytes Nbr of items in result
for each 4 bytes The ID of the Item
4 bytes The latitude part of the coordinate at requested offset.
4 bytes The longitude part of the coordinate at requested offset.
4 bytes The maxlat of the bbox.
4 bytes The minlon of the bbox.
4 bytes The minlat of the bbox.
end each 4 bytes The maxlon of the bbox.

Add one coordinate to this packet.

Parameters:

bbox The boundingbox for the item.

Get the coordinate for item nuber index.

Parameters:
index The index of the lat, long in the packet. Valid values are #0 <= index < getNbrItems()#.
itemID Outparameter that is set to the ID of item number index.
lat Outparameter that is set to the latitude for item number index.
lon Outparameter that is set to the longitude for item number index.

lat Outparameter that is set to the latitude for item number index.
lon Outparameter that is set to the longitude for item number index.
bbox The bounding box of the Item. Will be filled with boundingbox data if possible.

The number of bytes per item.

4 bytes itemid, 4 bytes lat, 4 bytes lon, 16 byte BBox
